lines.text: I haven't had any yet, so I can't take more.
You mean you can't take less. It is very easy to take more than nothing.
How can you go on talking so quietly with your head in a ditch?
What does it matter where my body happens to be? My mind goes on working all the same. In fact, I once invented a new pudding during the meat course.
In time to have it cooked for the next course, hmmm? That was quick work!
Well, not the next course. In fact, I don't believe that pudding even was cooked.
What did you mean it to be made of?
Well it began with blotting paper.
That wouldn't be very nice, I'm afraid.
Not very nice alone, but imagine how good it would be mixed with other things such as gunpowder and sealing wax.
I've often seen a cat without a grin - but a grin without a cat!
